feed.title: La Grande Rivière - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , La Grande Rivière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:38 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -20.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 1:18 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -20.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -23.1°C
Wind: SSE 22 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
